Advocacy & Leadership

Empowering Youth Leaders for Change

Training the next generation of leaders to advocate for social justice, equality, and sustainable development.

Creating Impact Through Advocacy

Mobilizing youth to create meaningful change in their communities

Our Focus Areas

Addressing critical social issues through youth-led campaigns

Health & Wellbeing

Advocating for better healthcare access, mental health awareness, and healthy living in rural communities.

Active Campaigns:

  • Mental Health Awareness
  • Clean Water Access
  • Nutrition Education
  • COVID-19 Response

Education Rights

Fighting for quality education, equal opportunities, and inclusive learning for all children.

Active Campaigns:

  • Right to Education
  • Digital Divide
  • Girl Child Education
  • School Infrastructure

Social Justice

Standing up against discrimination and working towards an inclusive, equitable society.

Active Campaigns:

  • Gender Equality
  • Caste Discrimination
  • LGBTQ+ Rights
  • Child Protection

Environmental Action

Mobilizing youth to protect the environment and combat climate change.

Active Campaigns:

  • Plastic Free Villages
  • Tree Plantation
  • Clean Energy
  • Water Conservation

Youth Leadership Program

A comprehensive 12-month program to develop tomorrow's social leaders

1

Foundation

3 months

Understanding social issues, communication skills, and community engagement basics.

Key Skills:

Public Speaking
Critical Thinking
Community Analysis
Basic Research
2

Development

3 months

Advanced training in advocacy, campaign planning, and grassroots mobilization.

Key Skills:

Campaign Strategy
Social Media
Fundraising
Coalition Building
3

Action

6 months

Lead real campaigns, work with policymakers, and create measurable impact.

Key Skills:

Project Management
Policy Advocacy
Media Relations
Impact Measurement

Featured Campaigns

Youth-led initiatives creating real change in communities

50+ villages cleaned

Swachh Gaon Abhiyan

Youth-led initiative to make villages clean, green, and plastic-free.

10,000+ girls enrolled

Beti Bachao Campaign

Fighting gender discrimination and promoting girls education.

5,000+ trained

Digital Literacy Drive

Bridging the digital divide in rural communities through training.

Voices of Change

Hear from our youth leaders who are making a difference

Ananya Singh

Youth Leader

"The leadership program transformed me from a concerned citizen to an effective change-maker. I led a campaign that resulted in 3 new schools in my district."

Arjun Patel

Campaign Coordinator

"Through Yuvastambh, I found my voice and purpose. Our environmental campaign planted 10,000 trees and created a green revolution in our region."

Be part of a generation that's creating positive change. Your voice matters.
